Query.name: Insert_Appointment
Query.QuerySQL: insert into t_Appointment ([StudentID],[UserName],[AppointmentTime],[BookName],[ReadOver]) select @StudentID,[UserName]=(select [UserName] from t_User where [StudentID]= @StudentID),@AppointmentTime,@BookName,@ReadOver

Query.name: Select_Appointment_Page
Query.QuerySQL: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY [AppointmentTime] DESC) AS ROWNUM,* FROM (select [AppointmentID],[StudentID],[UserName],[AppointmentTime],[BookName],[reply],[ReadOver] from t_Appointment )as de WHERE [ReadOver]=0 {2}) AS t WHERE t.ROWNUM>{0} AND t.ROWNUM<={1}

Query.name: Select_Appointment_Page_ReadOver
Query.QuerySQL: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY [AppointmentTime] DESC) AS ROWNUM,* FROM (select [AppointmentID],[StudentID],[UserName],[AppointmentTime],[BookName],[reply],[ReadOver] from t_Appointment )as de WHERE 1=1 {2}) AS t WHERE t.ROWNUM>{0} AND t.ROWNUM<={1}

Query.name: Select_Appointment_Count
Query.QuerySQL: select COUNT(AppointmentID) from t_Appointment where 1=1 and [ReadOver]=0 {0}
